problem.markdown:
1. In case of retentive timer, the accumulated value () is made equal to preset on power failure () resets on power failure (x) is maintained /hold on power failure
2) Which of the following counters counts input pulses in decreasing manner? (x) Down Counter () Up Counter () Up Down Counter
3) OND stands for On Delay timer. () False (x) True () Can't say
4) Which of the following is an example for On Delay Timer application? () Emptying a tank () Filling a tank (x) Explosion of fire cracker
5) Which type of pulse is used for off delay timer? (x) High to low () Low to high () None of the above
problem.p: 1. In case of retentive timer, the accumulated value

choicegroup.choice: is made equal to preset on power failure

problem.p: 2) Which of the following counters counts input pulses in decreasing manner?
3) OND stands for On Delay timer.

5) Which type of pulse is used for off delay timer?
